translation.en: -["21 Seconds" by So Solid Crew plays] -[static hisses]
♪ Turn up the bassline ♪ ♪ I got 21 seconds To chat this rhyme in time ♪
translation.ko: 베이스라인을 올려 21초 안에 이 라임을 읊어

translation.en: ♪ First of all I'm gonna big up da ladies… ♪ [woman] Go on, Bosco.
♪ Mm, mine Don't gimme no deadline ♪
[girl] ♪ Gimme some more time Gimme 29 seconds to chat this rhyme ♪
translation.ko: 시간을 더 줘 이 라임을 읊을 29초를 줘

translation.en: ♪ Other MCs wait in line How old am I? 21 ♪
translation.ko: 다른 MC들이 기다려 나는 몇 살? 21

translation.en: ♪ I got 21 seconds, den my vocals done Two multiplied by 10 plus 1 ♪
[woman] Vita, please.
♪ Romeo done ♪
[woman] Can you just let your brother-- Hey, hey!
-[Vita crying] -[woman] Beres, chat to your kids, please.
[Beres] She deserve what she get. She ah provoke him.
translation.ko: 맞을 짓을 했지 오빠 성질을 왜 건드려?

translation.en: [woman] She knows how she gets. No fighting, please.
translation.ko: 저럴 줄 알면서도 저래 싸우지 좀 마라

translation.en: You're meant to look after each other.
Bosco Champion, put my camera down now.
-Beres, can you help me out? -[Beres] Mi cyaan right now.
translation.ko: 베레스, 보고만 있을 거야? - 애들은 나 혼자 키워? - 혼자 키우는 거 좋아하네

translation.en: [woman] Look, I'm raising these kids on my own. [Beres] Yuh nuh raise di pickney by yuhself.
translation.ko: - 애들은 나 혼자 키워? - 혼자 키우는 거 좋아하네

translation.en: [woman] Why is it-- Why do I have to speak to you all the time?
[crowd chanting] Champion! Champion! Champion! Champion!
[woman] Do we have eyes on Bosco Champion?
-We will in a second. -[man] You seen Bosco?
Mem, where's Bos?
[Memet] Sayin', sayin'?
-Not here. Nah, for real, where is he? -I ain't seen him for a minute, you know.
translation.ko: - 여기선 안 돼, 어딨어? - 안 보인 지 좀 됐어

translation.en: Not for a-- He's on in seven minutes. He needs to get mic'd up.
translation.ko: 7분 뒤면 무대에 서는데 마이크 달아야 해

translation.en: I dunno. Uh, dressing room, maybe.
Vita, we need Bosco.
Everybody needs Bosco. Give me a second.
[male voice 1] Bosco Champion is back.
-[female voice 1] Champion to the world. -[male voice 2] Champion to the world.
[male voice 3] I heard it's all about Bulla now. [female voice 2] Bosco's over.
[Vita] Bosco?
Are you in there?
[man] Yep.
-Is it happening again? -[man] Huh?
Bulla's onstage. I should be out there shelling him.
translation.ko: 불라가 무대에 섰어 내가 발라버려야 하는데

translation.en: Instead, I can't breathe.
Remember what we do, all right?
-[Vita] In through your nose. -[inhales deeply]
Out through your mouth. [exhales deeply]
I can't-- I can't do this, Vita.
My time's passed.
translation.ko: 내 시대는 갔어 이젠 불라가 대세야

translation.en: -It's all about Bulla now. -Bro, please.
translation.ko: 내 시대는 갔어 이젠 불라가 대세야 오빠, 좀! 불라는 오빠만큼 재능 없어

translation.en: Bulla doesn't have what you have.
translation.ko: 오빠, 좀! 불라는 오빠만큼 재능 없어

translation.en: You've got legacy behind you. Come on.
translation.ko: 오빠가 쌓은 업적이 얼마인데 정신 차려

translation.en: Look, let me in.
What's legacy when I been out the game two years?
Bro, Bulla will come, and he'll go.
Being in prison don't mean people have forgotten you. What's two years?
People don't want me anymore, man.
Listen, this scene is yours.
translation.ko: 잘 들어 이 무대는 오빠 거야

translation.en: Go out there, show yourself.
Show Bulla. Show all of them.
Show them you're still the Bosco Champion that people loved.
translation.ko: 사랑받던 보스코 챔피언이 건재하단 걸 보여줘

translation.en: Champion to the world, remember?
♪ Bulla, just relax, just sekkle ♪
translation.ko: 진정해, 불라 이걸 네 가방에 넣어라

translation.en: ♪ Put this in your bag So security don't detect this metal ♪
translation.ko: 진정해, 불라 이걸 네 가방에 넣어라 검색대에 쇳덩어리 안 걸리게 네 주제와 수준을 알게

translation.en: ♪ Know your role and level ♪
translation.ko: 검색대에 쇳덩어리 안 걸리게 네 주제와 수준을 알게

translation.en: ♪ I don't wanna Have to bun a man's skin like Dettol ♪
♪ Big magazine we ah deal with ♪ ♪ The straps got a long bottom Like Neville… ♪
translation.ko: 우리 손엔 대형 탄창 네빌 롱보텀 손엔 표창

translation.en: Good, yeah? You good to go? This is Bulla's last song.
translation.ko: 괜찮지? 할 수 있지? 불라의 마지막 노래야

translation.en: ♪ If I put my hand on my belt There ain't no sand in these shells ♪
translation.ko: 내 벨트에 손 올려 누구보다 빨리 쏴 올려

translation.en: ♪ Brrr, when I get one down Brrr, I hit his bredren as well… ♪
Yeah, yeah. I'm ready.
♪ So just cool, Fonzie. Yuh zeet? ♪
♪ So keep it 1 hunna Better still stay 100 ♪
♪ Can't even show face at the function I'm dumping ♪
translation.ko: 면상도 못 들이밀면서 내가 차버려 주지

translation.en: -Yes. -[MC] All right, all right.
He was talking the things. Big Bulla, everybody!
[man] Come on, my brudda.
What the fuck you doing, blud?
Oh shit, my bad, blud. I thought you was the cleaner, you know.
translation.ko: 아놔, 미안하게 됐네 난 또 청소부인 줄

translation.en: Nah, I seen the cleaner outside. You got your mum working real hard, innit?
translation.ko: 아니, 청소부는 밖에 있잖아 네가 부려먹는 네 엄마

translation.en: All right, all right. Bulla and crew. PA at Selfridges in 15.
translation.ko: 그만, 불라와 크루는 15분 뒤 셀카 타임

translation.en: [Bulla] It's all good, man.
We'll see who's talking about whose mum when your likkle comeback flops.
translation.ko: 네 잘난 컴백이 폭망하면 누구 엄마가 들먹거려질까?

translation.en: It's all right, though. I'll take care of his, you know what I mean?
translation.ko: 괜찮아 이 새끼 엄마는 내가 돌볼게

translation.en: She might have to earn it, though, you know what I mean?
[Bosco] Come here!
You gotta relax with that likkle temper, blud.
-You know like that? -Pussy!
I know you don't wanna go back to the pen.
-Let me go. -All right, all right. Bulla, outside now.
Gonna need that life jacket.
-[Bosco] Joker, bruv. -Hey, hey, hey, hey. Come on, Bosco, man.
Think about what you're doing, hey? Don't go losing what you've got here.
translation.ko: 뒷일을 생각해 손해 볼 짓은 하지 마

translation.en: Good luck out there.
[MC] Now next up is the man we've all been eager to see.
[Vita] Deep breaths, Bos. You got this, I promise.
But first, make some noise for my man, Marcello!
translation.ko: 그 전에 우리의 친구 마르셀로를 소개합니다!

translation.en: All right, if you're having a good time, let me hear you say, "Yeah, yeah!"
-[crowd cheers] -London, let me hear you make some noise.
translation.ko: 다들 즐거우시다면 '예, 예'를 외쳐주세요! 런던 시민 여러분 큰 환호 부탁합니다

translation.en: [woman] Careful. Shall we go and find Daddy? -[girl] Yeah, I'm excited. -[MC] I can't hear you!
translation.ko: - 조심, 아빠 어딨나 볼까? - 네, 너무 좋아요

translation.en: -[woman] All right, V? -[girl] Daddy!
Hey, you.
[Vita] Hey, Mum.
I missed you. You ready to see Daddy go onstage?
translation.ko: 보고 싶었어 아빠 무대 보고 싶니?

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Bosco] Five, and another five.
-[MC] I love him, you love him. -Big hug. You all right, Mummy?
translation.ko: - 네 - 하이 파이브, 또, 포옹도 엄마는 괜찮아요?

translation.en: -[MC] Are you ready? -Do me proud, son.
-[MC] Are you ready?! -You know I always do, Mum.
[MC] I don't believe you. -Are you lot ready? -[crowd roars]
All right. He's back. It's Bosco Champion!
-[Bosco] Mm, mm. -[girl laughs] [crowd chanting] Champion! Champion! Champion!
[muffled] Champion! Champion! Champion!
-Yo, yo, yo. Uh. -[crowd cheering] Hands up, hands up, hands up, hands up!
♪ Champion to the world ♪
♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.ko: 내 허리를 지탱하는 구찌 챔피언에겐 벨트가 있지

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.ko: 승자는 승자를 알아봐 네가 챔피언이라면 난 알아봐

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
Yeah!
Yo!
Ey yo, London!
What you lot saying? You missed me, yeah?
Wagwan? One, two, three, let's go!
-[music stops] -All right. Let me run one more.
-[whistling] -I just gotta say suttin' quickly.
I know seh some man only love the women in their life for what they can give dem.
translation.ko: 여자를 자기 편의대로 좋아하는 남자들이 있죠

translation.en: -That's not me. -[woman 1] Yes, Bosco!
I was taught from birth that we owe it all to women.
translation.ko: 여자 덕에 우리가 있단 걸 태어날 때부터 배웠죠

translation.en: And since a boy, there's been one woman, one Champion,
translation.ko: 어릴 때부터 한 여자 한 챔피언이 있었어요

translation.en: I couldn't have done any of this without, who's always got my back.
translation.ko: 이 사람 없인 저도 없죠 늘 제 편이 되어줬고요

translation.en: So, Mum, Aria Champion…
translation.ko: 그래서 말인데, 엄마 아리아 챔피언 씨

translation.en: …I just wanna thank you for everything you've done for me, man.
So this one 'ere's for you.
But also, for all the Black women out there.
-Mum, I want you to come out here. -Go on, Mum.
translation.ko: 엄마, 여기로 올라와요 - 가요, 엄마 - 부탁인데

translation.en: I beg you lot make some noise for my mummy one time, please.
translation.ko: - 가요, 엄마 - 부탁인데 우리 엄마를 위해 큰 환호 부탁합니다

translation.en: ♪ I got a Nubian queen ♪ ♪ I told her she can move in this week ♪
translation.ko: 나의 누비아 여왕이여 우리 집으로 환영이오

translation.en: ♪ She moving as we speak ♪ ♪ Sound like a movie to me ♪
translation.ko: 그녀와 같이 사는 건 내겐 영화 같은 사건

translation.en: ♪ All dem bwoy they know is self-hatred ♪
♪ They don't waan see A Black gyal make it ♪ ♪ They don't waan see A Black gyal naked ♪
translation.ko: 흑인 여성의 성공을 못 견디네 흑인 여성의 나체를 못 견디네

translation.en: ♪ And man are Black But they're Black-gyal haters ♪
♪ I'm gonna breed my Black gyal ♪ ♪ I'm gonna make Black babies ♪
translation.ko: 난 흑인 여자를 품에 안겠네 흑인 아기를 만들겠네

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna marry my Black gyal -[mouthing] -♪ And not in Las Vegas ♪
translation.ko: 내 흑인 여자와 웨딩 마치 라스베이거스는 아니, 마침

translation.en: ♪ Share my son Share my daughter ♪
translation.ko: 내 아들을 나누고 내 딸을 나누고…

translation.en: -Proud of your daddy? -Yeah.
♪ And can you share my fun Can you share my trauma? ♪
♪ I was fresh back from Ghana, Christmas ♪ ♪ That's where I met my partner, listen ♪
translation.ko: 가나 크리스마스에서 돌아왔어 거기서 내 여자를 만났어

translation.en: ♪ Next time I'm meeting her father ♪ ♪ It's just me, him, her, and lasagna ♪
translation.ko: 그녀의 아버지를 만났어 우리 셋과 라자냐만 있어

translation.en: ♪ Kinders Surprise no mum in the picture ♪ ♪ Died a few years back ♪
translation.ko: 사진에 엄마는 없어 몇 년 전에 돌아가셨어

translation.en: ♪ Now it's just her and her dad Older bro and one little sister ♪
translation.ko: 오직 그녀와 그녀의 아버지 오빠와 여동생뿐

translation.en: ♪ Miss Mum and found Mum in a mister ♪
♪ Peng ting from the hardest area ♪ ♪ Soft inside with a hard exterior ♪
translation.ko: 개천 출신의 매력남 외강내유, 안 나쁜

translation.en: ♪ We had a heart-to-heart And I'm hearing her ♪
translation.ko: 우린 마음을 터놓고 그녀의 이야기를 듣네

translation.en: ♪ Most Black woman have all got a complex That you can't class inferior ♪
♪ It's like the whole world thinks Any woman who's dark's inferior ♪
translation.ko: 온 세상이 검은 피부 여자는 열등하다고 하네

translation.en: ♪ Yo, I'm out on the road And the mandem are wild ♪
♪ But when I'm with my gyal I make the ancestors dem smile ♪
translation.ko: 하지만 내 여자와 있으면 조상님들 얼굴에 미소 가득 친구에게 전화로 소식을 가득

translation.en: ♪ I had to ring my brudda and tell him I think I found me the one ♪
translation.ko: 조상님들 얼굴에 미소 가득 친구에게 전화로 소식을 가득 내 반쪽을 찾아서 난 이득

translation.en: ♪ Like you did it before me So how is it done? ♪
Why he have Aria up on di stage fah?
translation.ko: 쟤는 왜 네 엄마를 무대로 불렀다니?

translation.en: Champions don't showboat like dis.
Where do you think he learned how to showboat?
-[kisses teeth] -♪ Oh no, they don't know ♪
Bwoy sawf.
♪ When the sun hits your skin You go gold ♪
[crowd chanting] Champion! Champion! Champion!
Champion! Champion! Champion! Champion!
Champion! Champion! Champion!
Champion! Champion! Champion!
[Aria] Thanks a lot.
[girl] Bye, Daddy!
So, what did you think, Dad?
Did all right.
Next time, yuh haffi give di crowd a likkle less.
translation.ko: 다음엔 관객에게 냉큼 다 주지 마라

translation.en: Cyaan too eager fi please dem. Yuh si mi?
-[man] There you go. It's all in there. -[woman] Thank you.
[Aria] Vita, don't forget to put the plates out.
translation.ko: 비타 접시 내놓는 거 까먹지 마라

translation.en: -Why would I forget? -[Aria] And bring the coleslaw back in.
translation.ko: 내가 왜 까먹겠어? 콜슬로도 들여놔라 바깥 기온이 너무 높아!

translation.en: -[Vita groans, kisses teeth] -It's too hot out there for that.
translation.ko: 콜슬로도 들여놔라 바깥 기온이 너무 높아! "챔피언 대 챔피언 각본: 캔디스 카티-윌리엄스"

translation.en: -[Vita] All right. -Hey. Hey.
[woman] Hi.
Don't let her stress you, V.
She's always stressing me.
Come on. Gimme a smile. Gimme one likkle smile. One likkle smile.
Sorry to break up the moment, but can you help me organize the table?
translation.ko: 끼어들어서 미안한데 테이블 정리 좀 도와라

translation.en: How you getting on there, Lennox?
Relax yuhself now, Aria. Mi have this ting unda control.
translation.ko: 편하게 있어, 아리아 이 몸이 다 알아서 해

translation.en: -Bosco will be happy. -[Aria] Yeah.
Speaking of Bosco, maybe he can help.
It's his birthday, Vita. He's 25. It's a big year.
What does that even mean?
-[Bosco] Yes. How are you, big man? -[man chuckles]
[man] Hey, bro.
-[Memet] You all right? How you doing? -Fuck, bro, big--
Yeah, nice of you to join us.
-Since when were you my timekeeper? -[Vita] Since always.
translation.ko: - 내 스케줄 관리라도 하냐? - 늘 하잖아

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds good.
Y'all right, Mummy?
You look good.
Why you sweating?
'Cause ever since Bosco came out, I've been running around after him.
translation.ko: 보스코가 출소한 뒤로 보스코 챙기느라 바빠

translation.en: Mm-hm. Aria and Beres got you back there. I knew they would.
If my parents could have got me into that prison to look after him, they would.
translation.ko: 감옥에 날 넣어서라도 뒷바라지를 시켰을 사람들이야

translation.en: -Well, make it work for you then. -How you mean?
Look, you've been doing this behind-the-scenes thing for years.
translation.ko: 네가 뒷바라지해 준 게 몇 년째니

translation.en: -It's too small for you, babe. -Yeah, but…
All I'm saying is, if you don't ask, you don't get.
translation.ko: 내 말은 구하지 않으면 받지도 못한다는 거야

translation.en: We need to be in a new season of doing what we want
translation.ko: 우리도 새롭게 살아보자 원하는 걸 하고

translation.en: and getting what we want.
[Vita] Oh.
Looks like Tayo just got here.
-[woman] I didn't realize she was invited. -She didn't come alone either.
translation.ko: - 걔도 오는지 몰랐네 - 혼자 온 게 아니야

translation.en: All right, come through with the blue jumper and mad sunglasses.
translation.ko: 같이 온 여자는 파란색 상의와 괴상한 선글라스를 걸쳤어

translation.en: If that's her new girl, you're not allowed to talk to her.
translation.ko: 타요의 새 여친이면 넌 말 섞지 마

translation.en: Uh, when you two got together, what did I say?
translation.ko: 너희 둘이 사귀었을 때 내가 뭐랬지?

translation.en: It was bad enough that your best friends had got together, and that you were--
translation.ko: 절친 둘이 사귀는 것만으로도 골치 아프다면서…

translation.en: Never getting involved, exactly.
translation.ko: 난 절대 관여 안 한다고 했지

translation.en: Whatever.
♪ Dark skin with the braids on Got a beat to her own song ♪
translation.ko: 검은색 피부에 브레이드 머리 그녀 노래에 비트가 있어

translation.en: ♪ Oh, girl, you're too cool Tell me where your shine from ♪
translation.ko: 너무 쿨한 여자야 어떻게 그렇게 빛나니?

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I wanna get mine on ♪
-Remember this one? -How could I forget? This was our riddim.
translation.ko: - 이 노래 기억나? - 당연! 우리 리듬이잖아!

translation.en: ♪ Looking like a 10 It's the way you walk in ♪
♪ So confident ♪ ♪ It don't cost me To pay you a compliment ♪
translation.ko: 너무 당당해 나도 모르게 찬사를 쏟아내

translation.en: ♪ And I know you deserve it-- ♪
Sing, man. I can see your mouth twitching. And I sound better when I sing with you.
translation.ko: 같이 불러, 입이 씰룩거리잖아 너랑 불러야 더 멋지단 말이야

translation.en: [both] ♪ With you, I'm so comfortable ♪ ♪ It's like I'm by myself ♪
translation.ko: 너랑 있으면 너무 편해 마치 나 혼자 같아

translation.en: ♪ In silence we say it all ♪
translation.ko: 아무 말 안 해도 우린 통해

translation.en: ♪ This life Can't do it without you ♪
translation.ko: 이번 생은 너 없이는 안 돼

translation.en: ♪ We're dancing alone It's our own party ♪ ♪ We don't need nobody else ♪
translation.ko: 우린 춤추네, 우리만의 파티 남들은 없어도 되는 파티

translation.en: [both] ♪ Oh, that's my girl ♪
I can't believe you gave up the music thing to be an assistant
translation.ko: 어떻게 네가 음악을 포기하고 덜떨어진 네 오라버니 조수질이나 하냐?

translation.en: to your dumb brother,
as well as write his bars.
When's he gonna write his music by himself?
translation.ko: 언제가 돼야 자기 손으로 곡을 쓴다니?

translation.en: Being a Champion is work, innit? From the top to the bottom.
translation.ko: 챔피언 가족으로 살기 힘들지? 하나부터 열까지

translation.en: Hm, you don't even know.
And I swear his manager, Dawn, Dusk, whatever her name is,
translation.ko: 돈 더스크인가 뭔가 하는 매니저 말이야

translation.en: I swear she doesn't even do anything. Honey, she does nothing.
translation.ko: - 그 여자 하는 일이 없을걸 - 허니, 아무것도 안 해

translation.en: ♪ Oh, that's my girl ♪
♪ Know she in it for a lifetime Holding me down ♪
♪ That's my girl ♪
♪ Living the lifestyle Yeah, this is our world ♪
♪ That's my girl Making that paper ♪
translation.ko: 바로 내 여자야 돈도 잘 버는 여자야

translation.en: ♪ So if you don't know ♪
[both] ♪ That's my girl ♪
♪ My girl, my girl ♪
[Honey] ♪ More than a friend ♪
[both] ♪ That's my genna You're more like family ♪ [Honey] ♪ Only wanna see you win ♪
translation.ko: 내 여자야, 가족과 같아 네가 잘되면 난 좋아

translation.en: [girl] I can't wait.
[woman] Do you wanna ring the doorbell?
-[girl] This time. -Yeah.
-[doorbell rings] -Good girl. Come here.
-[girl] Hi! -Hi! -[woman laughs] -[Aria] Oh! Come in!
Sorry we're late. Mummy's wig wasn't doing what she wanted.
translation.ko: 늦어서 죄송해요 엄마 가발이 말을 안 들어서요

translation.en: -Uh, you talk too much, Milan. -[Aria chuckles] Come here.
translation.ko: 쓸데없는 얘기 하네, 밀란 이리 와

translation.en: Why don't you go find your daddy and go give him his presents, yeah?
-[Milan] Okay. -Okay.
-Hello. -Hey.
-Where's your fiancé? -Oh, parking. He'll be here in a sec.
translation.ko: - 네 약혼자는? - 주차해요, 곧 올 거예요

translation.en: Okay.
[Milan] Nanny, help me find him.
-Who is my little princess looking for? -[Milan] Dad!
translation.ko: 우리 공주님이 누굴 찾으실까? 아빠! 생일 축하해요!

translation.en: -[laughs] -Happy birthday!
-Thank you. You okay? -[Milan] Yeah.
[Vita] Mum, where's the rest of the napkins?
-Ooh. -Excuse me. Head to the garden when you're ready. There's plenty of food, yeah?
-Wanna get food? -[Milan] Yeah.
-Let's go! -[woman chuckles]
And, uh, how's my other princess?
I'm fine.
Congrats. You made it to 25 in one piece.
Bosco. Happy birthday, brother.
Yeah. Thanks for getting the family down.
Yeah, well, you know, it's my job to keep them safe, innit?
Yeah, baby. I'm gonna go and grab some food, let you two talk shop.
translation.ko: 난 뭐 좀 먹으러 갈게 둘은 얘기 더 해

translation.en: Many happy returns, fella.
Aria. Nice to see you, darlin'.
Where's that famous curried goat of yours?
Oi.
-I miss you. -[scoffs]
Of course you do.
Your mum said that we need more salad.
You're lucky I wasn't your bruvva.
-We're gonna tell him soon. -Mm. Just let him enjoy his birthday first.
translation.ko: 조만간 말할 거야 일단 생일이 먼저잖아

translation.en: [Honey] And how's that gonna go? "Hi, Bos. I fucked your best friend."
translation.ko: 잘될 거 같냐? '나 오빠 절친이랑 뒹굴었어'

translation.en: [Tayo] How you doing, Mem?
-[Memet] Yes, good. -You good? -[Memet] I'm good, I'm good. -All right, all right. Hey, who's that you come with? Huh?
translation.ko: 그럼, 잘 지냈지 같이 온 사람은 누구야?

translation.en: It's just a friend, just a friend. Don't watch that, don't watch that.
Yo, I saw you headlining. Yeah?
translation.ko: 야, 너 헤드라이너로 나온 거 봤어

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Tayo] Come on.
Man, when you used to spin a little one-two tracks for Bosco,
translation.ko: 보스코한테 한두 트랙 틀어주던 게 엊그제 같은데

translation.en: we never knew you'd be making that money.
[Memet] Look at you though. I see Dave and Simz in one of your suits.
translation.ko: 너야말로! 데이브랑 리틀 심즈가 네 옷 입더라

translation.en: [Vita] Hey, Bosco, this is your party.
Get out of the corner. Let Mem do what he's doing.
[Tayo] Hey. -[Vita] You all right? [chuckles] -[Tayo] Mm. Mm-hm.
Yo, Vita.
-Lookin' nice. -Always.
-Yeah, I'm tryna look that cute. -[Bosco] Yo. Come here.
translation.ko: - 멋지네, 내 스타일이야 - 당연하지 야, 이리 와

translation.en: Gimme one sec.
-[upbeat music plays over speakers] -Where's Dad?
[Vita] Dunno.
He should have been here by now. I'll give him a call.
You know it started three hours ago, and Bosco's been looking for you.
translation.ko: 파티는 3시간 전에 시작했고 보스코가 아빠 찾았어요

translation.en: [Beres] Since Bosco a bwoy, him always ah look fi mi.
And still you're never there.
[man 1] Hey. Hey, kiss and make up. -[laughing] -Eediat bwoy.
-[Bosco] You man are jokers. -["Happy Birthday" plays over speakers]
-What? -Come on, bro. 'Low it.
Nah, nah, nah. It's your day, my guy. Huh?
[man 3] Go on, Milan.
Yeah.
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
♪ Happy birthday to Daddy ♪
♪ Happy birthday to you ♪
-Yeah. -[Lennox] Hey!
Yes, Milan!
[man 5] Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
-What's going on, man? -[officer] Are you Bosco Champion, sir?
translation.ko: - 댁이 보스코 챔피언입니까? - 나인 거 알잖아요

translation.en: -[Bosco sighs] You know it's me. -[Vita] What's going on?
translation.ko: - 댁이 보스코 챔피언입니까? - 나인 거 알잖아요 소음 민원이 들어와서요 가석방 조건 위배입니다

translation.en: We've had noise complaints. It's a breach of your terms of release.
translation.ko: 소음 민원이 들어와서요 가석방 조건 위배입니다

translation.en: -You licked off my mum's gate? -This is your address.
translation.ko: - 그렇다고 집 문을 부숴요? - 여기가 거주지 맞죠?

translation.en: Hey, shut up, man! You lot have been on me since I come out.
translation.ko: 닥쳐! 내가 출소한 뒤 나만 노리고 있었지?

translation.en: -Get out my way. -[Beres] Hey, that's my son.
Which one of you is gonna pay for my gate? Is it you?
translation.ko: 문값 보상은 누가 하죠? 댁이요? 잘하는 짓이군요

translation.en: You lot should be ashamed of yourself.
translation.ko: 문값 보상은 누가 하죠? 댁이요? 잘하는 짓이군요 - 야, 우리 엄마 건들지 마 - 놔줘요

translation.en: -Hey, you lot, don't touch my mum! -[Lennox] Let go of her.
translation.ko: - 야, 우리 엄마 건들지 마 - 놔줘요

translation.en: -[Bosco] Get off me! -What are you doing? Get off my mum! -Get off my mum! -[muffled arguing]
translation.ko: - 이거 놔! - 우리 엄마한테서 손 떼요!

translation.en: [officer] I'm arresting you on suspicion of assaulting a police officer.
Get off!
Get that phone out of my face! How can you arrest someone over a noise complaint?
All right, all right. Easy, bruv.
Why are you arresting him?
I told you already, he hasn't done anything!
-[officer] That's it, son. -[Aria] Why are you arresting him?
translation.ko: - 왜 체포하냐고요? - 어떻게 손 좀 써봐요

translation.en: -Hey, yo! You lot do suttin', man. -Mind your head.
translation.ko: - 왜 체포하냐고요? - 어떻게 손 좀 써봐요 머리 조심하십시오

translation.en: No, I don't have to get back! Don't press up on me! Don't press up on me!
translation.ko: 내가 왜 들어가야 하는데? 들이밀지 마요!

translation.en: I swear to God. Why are you arresting him? Why don't you arrest some real criminals?
translation.ko: 대체 왜 체포하는데요? 진짜 범죄자나 체포해요!

translation.en: He's not a criminal. Back away from me!
Don't press up on me!
I swear to God, don't press up on me! Move back! Move back! Back up! Give me my space!
translation.ko: 진짜, 들이밀지 말라고! 뒤로 가요! 물러서라고!

translation.en: Oh!
Bosco!
-[Lennox] We've got you, Bosco! -This is ridiculous.
Vita, Vita, I'm gonna try and calm your mum down.
translation.ko: 비타, 난 네 엄마를 진정시킬 테니까

translation.en: Can you see if you can sort this out, yeah?
It's all right, babes. We got this. We got this.
Yeah.
[woman] Calm down, Vita. If he didn't do anything, they'll let him go.
[Vita] Dawn, you're supposed to be his manager. He needs to call a solicitor.
translation.ko: 매니저란 사람이 뭐 해요? 돈, 변호사를 부르라고요!

translation.en: [chuckles] Um, you see, the thing is…
[woman on video] And I'm just going to…
Hello? Are you there?
Yeah, um…
-[woman] …to ensure it is moisturized… -[Dawn] Mm.
I don't think we need to be calling anybody just yet.
What? He needs a solicitor down there now. That's not that much.
translation.ko: 네? 당장 변호사가 필요해요 어려운 일도 아니잖아요

translation.en: [Dawn] Bosco will be fine. Please.
[Vita] You're not taking this seriously enough.
[Dawn] And your problem, Vita, is that you tek tings a likkle bit too seriously.
translation.ko: 넌 모든 걸 너무 심각하게 생각해서 문제야, 비타 "타요 어떡해?!"

translation.en: Just give it a few hours.
-They'll let him go. -[Bosco yells]
They ain't got a case against him, trust me.
Vita?
Hello?
He did not deserve to be treated like that.
translation.ko: 이런 식의 취급을 받을 사람이 아니에요

translation.en: -Bosco back in the pen again? -Heard that boom, boom, boom. Feds came to the door. It's crazy.
translation.ko: - 보스코가 또 감방행이래요! - 경찰이 쾅 쳐들어왔어요

translation.en: [man 1] I can't believe it. My boy Bosco…
translation.ko: 보스코가 말도 안 되는 일을 겪네요

translation.en: [woman 1] They came to his mother's house, locked him up.
translation.ko: 어머니 집에 쳐들어가서 보스코를 잡아 가뒀어요

translation.en: Free Bosco.
The system's just always out to get us.
-[man 2] It's a disgrace. -[woman 2] It's outrageous.
How are the police acting like this though?
Man, these feds ain't got nuttin' better to do. Free Bosco. Why am I hearing he's been locked up? Long day.
translation.ko: 경찰이 할 일이 그렇게 없나? 보스코가 체포됐다니, 풀어줘요

translation.en: So you get one whiff of freedom, and now you're getting locked up again?
[officer] No further action.
[Bosco] You know what? As a Black man in this England…
Easy on the bacon.
…this world even,
I'll never be seen as innocent.
translation.ko: 전 매번 죄인 취급 받을 거예요

translation.en: My name will always be up for question. But guess what?
You can't hold a Champion down.
And the next time you wanna come my mum's house to nick me,
translation.ko: 우리 엄마 집에 쳐들어와 날 또 체포하려거든

translation.en: make sure you have a warrant, blud.
Look at them. Idiots. NFA, man. NFA.
In a bit.
[Aria] Why haven't I heard anything?
-[drill whirring] -I feel sick.
Don't worry about Bosco. He'll be fine.
[scoffs] He'll be better off than this gate was at the very least.
Yuh see dat bwoy?
Him have a temper just like Aria.
Pure fire.
Vita though? She's like mi.
She still. She focused.
Don't mek her emotions run her.
But Bosco, just like him madda.
I might let my emotions run me, Beres, but I ran this house, yeah?
translation.ko: 내가 감정에 휘둘릴진 몰라도 이 집을 휘두르는 건 나야

translation.en: I ran this house when you couldn't.
translation.ko: 능력 없는 당신 대신 내가 가장이었어

translation.en: I was, uh-- [kisses teeth]
Ah suh yuh always ah come wid…
[Vita] Stop, stop. He's coming.
-[Memet] Chill out. -[Vita] He's coming.
[Memet whispering] All right.
[Bosco] Oi. It's going off.
You know, in all these years, I've never seen you this hungry.
translation.ko: 살면서 이렇게 굶주린 모습은 처음 봐

translation.en: [Memet] I have, you know. I really have.
Bos, I gotta ask you something.
Ask then.
I think I should be your manager.
Come on, Bos, man. You know I do a good job.
-I been doing a good job. -No, Vita, man.
Dawn is useless. And I'm always, always by your side.
translation.ko: 돈이 하는 게 뭔데? 늘 오빠 곁을 지키는 건 나야

translation.en: Where was she when you got arrested this time and the last?
translation.ko: 이번에 체포될 때 돈은 어디 있었지? 저번에는?

translation.en: Where was she when the organizers decided that Bulla should close the show instead of you, and I had--
translation.ko: 불라가 클로저가 될 뻔할 때 돈은 어디 있었냐고? 내가…

translation.en: All right, Vita, man.
[kisses teeth] Sekkle yourself.
Let me sleep on it, get my head straight, and I will think about it.
translation.ko: 고민해 볼게 머리 좀 비우고 생각해 볼게

translation.en: -Okay. -Jesus.
Thanks.
[Memet] What are we doing now?
[Aria] Vita?
-Is that you? -[sighs] Yeah, Mum. I'm really tired.
What?
It's all over the Internet.
I've been here losing my mind, and you couldn't pick up the phone.
translation.ko: 엄마는 걱정돼서 죽겠는데 넌 전화도 안 하니?

translation.en: Mum, he's fine. He's home. Can we talk about this tomorrow? I'm tired.
Vita, I told you already, you need to be telling me what's going on with him.
translation.ko: 오빠한테 무슨 일이 있는 건지 엄마한테는 말해야지

translation.en: -I can't go through this again. -Mum.
translation.ko: - 또 이런 일 있으면 어떡해 - 엄마

translation.en: We need to make sure that he's okay. This police business--
translation.ko: 네 오빠가 괜찮아야 할 텐데 이번 경찰 일로…

translation.en: -Night, Mum. -It's not good for him, Vita.
translation.ko: 주무세요, 엄마 네 오빠한테 안 좋다고, 비타

translation.en: -We need to be doing more. -[Vita] I said night, Mum.
I can't wait till we don't have to hide anymore.
translation.ko: 얼른 우리 관계 다 까발리고 싶다

translation.en: I can properly take you out, yeah?
Show you off.
And we can go on holidays.
Yeah. Let's just focus on telling Bosco first.
[Bosco] Yo, where you at?
Yo, um… I'm at home, innit.
I'm at my home, in my bedroom.
translation.ko: 우리 집, 내 방 방금 일어났어, 왜?

translation.en: -I-- I just woke up. What you sayin'? -[Bosco] Yeah, whatever, man.
translation.ko: 우리 집, 내 방 방금 일어났어, 왜? 아, 됐고

translation.en: Meet me at the label office at 1, and pick up Vita on the way. Come on.
translation.ko: 레이블 본사에서 1시에 봐 오는 길에 비타도 데려와

translation.en: All right.
Oh God, it's really happening.
What is?
Bosco's actually gonna make me his manager.
translation.ko: 보스코가 날 매니저 자리에 앉히려나 봐

translation.en: I knew this day would come. I've got plans. I've got plans.
translation.ko: 이런 날이 올 줄 알았어 계획해 놓은 바가 있지

translation.en: V.
Why do you even wanna do this, man?
Because I have been doing this.
translation.ko: 이 일을 계속해 왔으니까 이젠 인정받을 때도 됐잖아

translation.en: -It's time I got recognized for doing it. -I dunno, babe. I just think, like…
translation.ko: 이 일을 계속해 왔으니까 이젠 인정받을 때도 됐잖아 난 모르겠어, 내 생각엔…

translation.en: Don't you wanna do suttin' for yourself? You've got talent.
translation.ko: 네가 하고 싶은 거 없어? 재능 있잖아

translation.en: Why don't you use it?
No, I'm better off behind the scenes, Mem.
translation.ko: 아니 난 뒤에서 일하는 게 나아

translation.en: [sighs] All right. If you say so.
[woman] Sorry for the wait. Team Champion?
-Yo. -They're ready for you.
-[shutter clicks] -Cool. It's for your pass.
Can I get a quick pic of your manager?
-Uh, here she is. -Sorry, running late.
Oi, Memet, Vita. All right?
-All right, can I get your pic? -Yes, let's do it. Cool.
I beg you get me a tea, please.
Make sure it's got oat milk in it, yeah? Cow milk's dead.
What?
You know it messes up my stomach, innit?
-[Memet] V. -[Vita] This is bullshit.
Don't be like that, man.
They do make tea here, you know?
-[Honey] Are you all right? -[Vita] No, I'm not all right.
Bosco basically said I can be his manager, yeah?
translation.ko: 보스코가 날 매니저 시킬 것처럼 굴더니

translation.en: Next thing I know, Dawn's walking in, and he's telling me shit about oat milk.
translation.ko: 돈이 버젓이 들어오잖아 나보곤 귀리우유 지랄을 떨고

translation.en: -Okay, shut up, shut up. I need you bad. -Huh?
-I need you to come meet me now. -Where are you?
translation.ko: - 당장 나 보러 오라고 - 어디 있는데?

translation.en: Don't worry. I'm gonna send you the address.
-Are you okay? -Come now.
Bosco, good afternoon. How goes it? Are you well?
Uh, I'm Philip. I'm going to be heading up our newly created street music division.
translation.ko: 난 필립이고 새로 조직된 스트리트 뮤직 팀 팀장이에요

translation.en: I'll level with you.
Your streaming numbers have gone through the roof since the arrest.
translation.ko: 체포된 후 보스코 음악의 조회수가 하늘로 치솟았어요

translation.en: Honestly, money can't buy this kind of exposure.
translation.ko: 솔직히 그런 노출은 돈으로도 못 사죠

translation.en: I've genuinely, genuinely never seen our marketing team more galvanized.
translation.ko: 우리 마케팅 팀이 입이 떡 벌어졌더라고요

translation.en: Ooh, you hear that, Bosco?
You, Bosco Champion, are gonna be a very busy man.
translation.ko: 보스코 챔피언 씨는 앞으로 엄청 바빠질 겁니다

translation.en: We're talking UK tour. We're talking hot new track.
So to cash in on the whole arrest thing, whatever, you bring that out now.
translation.ko: 그 체포 코인에 편승하려면 당장 뭐라도 내야 해요

translation.en: We're thinking, and this is brilliant, we call it "Locked Up."
And for the video, we can have you in a makeshift prison cell…
translation.ko: 뮤직비디오에선 보스코 씨가 가짜 감방에 갇히는 거죠

translation.en: -Uh, yeah, anything prison-- -I dunno about all that, bro.
translation.ko: 감옥과 관련된 거면… 난 잘 모르겠어요

translation.en: UK tour sounds peak, but I dunno about all that "locked up" stuff--
Nah, he'll do it. Sounds great!
You're gonna be a busy man, Bosco. [chuckles nervously]
[Vita] What's going on?
Are you all right?
Yes, I am gassed.
Uh, about what? Honey, you said it was an emergency.
It is. Okay?
-Where are we? -Come on.
[Vita] Mate, where are we?
Why are we even here?
[Honey] Hey, boys.
-Oi, Honey. -[Honey] How you doing?
Yeah. All the glamour as normal. -Good up. -[Honey chuckles]
[Honey] You know me. This is Vita. Glamour's not really her thing.
translation.ko: 알면서, 이 친구는 비타야 관능미하곤 안 친해

translation.en: Where do I know your face from?
Nowhere.
One minute.
For sure, you know. [kisses teeth]
Where you going?
I'm about to do something that's gonna change our lives.
I don't wanna change my life. My life's just fine.
translation.ko: 난 인생 역전 필요 없어 지금으로도 만족해

translation.en: Look how your own brother fucked you over. Again.
Don't you think it's time you did something for yourself? Trust me.
translation.ko: 이젠 네 길을 가야 할 때야 날 믿어

translation.en: We're good. It's all good.
[Bulla] All right, then.
-[man] Hey, you all right? -Yeah.
There's nuttin' to be scared of, you know. We're all harmless in here.
translation.ko: 무서워할 거 없어 우리 나쁜 사람 아니야

translation.en: -Are you sure? -[man] Yeah, I'm sure.
I'm Laurent, by the way.
Hi, Laurent.
Honestly, babe, just hear our voices. We're exactly what you've been missing.
translation.ko: 우리 목소리부터 들어봐 딱 너희가 찾던 걸 테니까

translation.en: Yeah?
We'll see about that, innit.
Let me see what you're dealing with.
[Beres] Yuh need to fix up, bwoy.
It's my family yuh git di name Champion.
-Wah mi always ah tell yuh? -Winners only.
Mi cyaan hear yuh.
Look pon mi when mi ah talk to yuh!
translation.ko: 내가 말할 때 딴 데 보지 마

translation.en: -Winners only. -Dat's right. Champion.
-Winners only. -I get it. You ain't gotta lecture me.
If yuh go back ah prison, what dat mean for di family?
translation.ko: 네가 또 감옥 가면 우리 가족은 뭐가 돼?

translation.en: -I'm not gonna go back there. -Awoah!
Awoah.
-The label want me to go on tour. -Dem ah pay yuh fi dat?
Yeah, they're gonna front the money.
-Dunno if I wanna do it. -How yuh mean?
-Dunno if I'm ready for dem kinda tings. -Ready?
Ready? [laughs]
Yuh betta git ready.
Wah yuh wait for, bwoy?
Go find yuh sister suh we can git to work pon a new track.
translation.ko: 동생이나 찾아와 신곡 준비 안 해?

translation.en: And while mi remember, di people dem tell mi seh di rent ah late.
translation.ko: 내 기억으론 여기 집세 아직 안 냈다더라

translation.en: -You ready? -No.
♪ I was on the road tryna get bands ♪ ♪ Used to put the trap phone In the left hand ♪
translation.ko: 밴드를 구하러 길을 떠났어 폰은 왼손에 쥐었어

translation.en: ♪ Do the music And now they wanna bred man ♪ ♪ Beg you don't phone me Till the check lands ♪
translation.ko: 음악으로 배춧잎을 벌어 수표 올 때까지 전화는 버려

translation.en: ♪ I was OT in the Shetlands ♪ ♪ Ain't nuttin' that I won't do For the bread, fam ♪
translation.ko: 셰틀랜드 제도로 간 나 돈과 가족을 위해 멀리도 갔나

translation.en: ♪ And that can mean Two in your head, fam ♪ ♪ Get a man marked like a exam ♪
translation.ko: 그래서 네 머리에 빵야빵야 시험 점수처럼 빵이야, 빵이야

translation.en: ♪ Gyal tryna warn me 'bout the ex-man ♪ ♪ But still likes the mystique I'm a X-man ♪
translation.ko: 그녀가 알려준 악당맨 난 신비로운 엑스맨

translation.en: ♪ Give it a week And tell her it's dead, man ♪ Straight face and delivery deadpan ♪
translation.ko: 일주일 뒤면 끝났다고 말해 차가운 얼굴로 소식을 전해

translation.en: ♪ Can't finesse, man I stay with a method like Redman ♪
translation.ko: 오지게 서투른 나는 헤매 방법을 잘 아는 레드맨

translation.en: ♪ As for dem man Gang still put holes in headbands ♪
translation.ko: 갱단이 입는 맨투맨 이마에 구멍 내는 총기맨

translation.en: ♪ Yuh zeet? ♪ ♪ Dat one deh waan me, she a freak But she nuh waan speak, she ah pree ♪
translation.ko: 날 원하는 그녀는 괴물 대화를 거부하는 그녀는 속물

translation.en: [man] Sounds hard. ♪ I ain't got that time… ♪
translation.ko: 차 열쇠 들고, 빠이빠이 시간이 없어, 빨리빨리

translation.en: [Laurent] Same lyrics. Jump on in the chorus, yeah? Go.
translation.ko: 같은 가사니까 코러스 들어가면 돼, 시작해

translation.en: ♪ Better watch you don't catch no strays ♪
♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
-♪ Life is a dream, time does come true ♪ -♪ Time does come true ♪ ♪ And in my sleep I think of you ♪
translation.ko: 인생은 꿈, 시간은 현실 꿈에서 널 생각하는 나

translation.en: What is it? Ah, fuck. Just keep going.
-♪ Basically, probability ♪ -[Honey humming] -♪ Says that fate's come side with me ♪ -[Honey humming]
♪ It's been so long on my shelf ♪
I'll come in here.
[both] ♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
♪ Situation ♪
♪ Train comes I don't know its destination ♪
♪ I don't know where you're going, V ♪ ♪ But if you want You can come roll with me ♪
translation.ko: 어디 가는지 모르겠지만, V 나랑 같이 가도 돼

translation.en: ♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
Wow. Okay, that was good. That was good. Let's get some playback on that.
-[vocal playback] -[Laurent] Play that back.
-Run that, run that. -[Laurent] Bulla.
Yo, I need to hear that now.
♪ It's a one-way ticket To a madman's situation ♪
Yeah, get rid of that one there still. Yeah, yeah, yeah. That one's definitely not needed.
translation.ko: 그거는 없애 그래, 그건 전혀 필요 없어

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Get rid. Get rid.
-[Honey] What you doing? -We're just seeing. [Vita's vocal] ♪ Life is a dream, time does come true ♪
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Yeah, that's it.
That's it.
That's the sound. See you?
You got the voice. That's it.
[Honey] What'd you mean?
We come as a pair, you know? Both of our voices.
translation.ko: 우린 듀오로 왔어 우리 둘의 목소리로…

translation.en: That's the way this business works. Let's get a bit more volume on that.
translation.ko: 원래 이 바닥이 이래 이거 소리 더 키워봐

translation.en: "Both of our voices."
V, come.
[Bulla] Here we go.
-Why were you singing? -What'd you mean?
-Why did you start whispering shit? -I didn't.
Literally, trying to show me up, and now you've done it. Are you happy now?
translation.ko: 날 망신 주려는 속셈이니? 성공해서 좋겠어

translation.en: Why didn't you say anything when they said they're gonna cut me out?
They're gonna cut me out of the whole song! You said you--
Oi. Oi, oi. Come on.
It's funny though.
-Hey, don't laugh. -[Bulla kisses teeth]
She coming back in?
Hey, Vita. Hey, V.
This is why I don't work with females.
-V, hold up. Just a second. -What?
Now, look, you're not-- You're not gonna like what I'm about to say here,
translation.ko: 지금 내가 하려는 말이 달갑지 않겠지만

translation.en: but someone with talent like yours ain't ever gonna have it easy.
translation.ko: 너 같은 재능을 가진 사람은 늘 골칫거리가 생겨

translation.en: Look, I know the whole Bosco/Chantelle thing makes this tricky,
translation.ko: 보스코와 샨텔 일 때문에 난처할 수 있겠지만

translation.en: but I can make you a star.
translation.ko: 내가 널 스타로 만들 수 있어

translation.en: I'm good doing what I'm doing. Thanks.
You're working in your mum's restaurant when you're not working for your bruvva.
translation.ko: 오빠 일을 안 해줄 때면 엄마 식당에서 일하잖아

translation.en: Bosco's the one whose name everyone knows. He's the-- He's the golden boy.
translation.ko: 사람들이 아는 이름은 보스코야 황금 장남이지

translation.en: And Vita's just someone who looks after him.
They're never gonna change.
But we…
we can change your life.
-It could be amazing. -Look.
You don't understand, Mark.
That kind of thing doesn't run with my family,
translation.ko: 그런 건 우리 가족한테 안 통해

translation.en: let alone Bosco.
Besides, I ain't a star kinda girl, so thank you.
Hey.
Yes, you are.
Trust.
Anyway, you just think about it, yeah?
-[door opens] -[Bosco] Yo, Mummy.
Hey, Bos.
-All right? -Yeah.
Wagwan?
Why you acting up, man?
Don't be like that, man. It's just business.
All right, just gimme a likkle time with Dawn.
translation.ko: 알았어 일단 돈과는 시간을 좀 줘

translation.en: Lemme sort things out, then it's all you. Yeah?
translation.ko: 정리해 볼게 그러면 네가 해, 알았지?

translation.en: -That's cool. But actually, I was-- -Yeah, man.
Dawn come through this time, innit? But I see what you do for me. Trust me.
translation.ko: 돈이 이번엔 잘했잖아 그래도 네 고생은 내가 알지

translation.en: -I need to tell you something else. -I kinda need you to…
I kinda need you to help me make the song that the label want. Come on, man.
translation.ko: 곡 쓰는 것 좀 도와줘라 레이블에서 곡 달래, 부탁이야

translation.en: Do I have a choice?
You know you wanna help your big bro.
I might actually have something that could work.
This one.
♪ Went jail for a likkle possession Intent or not, it's a weapon ♪
translation.ko: 소지죄로 들어간 감방 총이었는데 난 깜빡

translation.en: -Mm. -♪ Same time got a pending case ♪ -♪ Looks like I'm gone for a second ♪ -Mm.
translation.ko: 심리 중인 또 다른 소송 이번에 또 감방 소속

translation.en: ♪ You know man's got expensive taste ♪ -♪ I need them creps in size 7 ♪ -Size 7, yeah.
translation.ko: 내 취향은 비싸단 말이야 사이즈 7은 괜찮단 말이야

translation.en: ♪ I told my girlfriend that she can leave I came home, I knew she got that message ♪
translation.ko: 여친한테 떠나도 된다고 말했고 집에 오니 메시지가 접수되었고

translation.en: Pssh. What? -When did you start writing this? -When you first got out.
translation.ko: - 이야, 언제 쓴 거야? - 오빠 첫 출소 때

translation.en: ♪ That message ♪ ♪ I'm home now We gotta address it ♪
translation.ko: 난 집에 돌아왔는데 이젠 메시지 얘기를 하는데

translation.en: ♪ Everyone waan know where man's head is ♪
Nah, man, I'm not even saying that.
Why?
Why you tryna get man emotional for? There's nothing wrong with my head.
translation.ko: 왜 울컥하게 만드는데? 내 머리가 뭐가 어때서?

translation.en: I didn't say that.
Sorry, Vita, this is the last of it. You weren't hungry, were you?
translation.ko: 비타, 남은 게 이게 다인데 어쩌니? 넌 배 안 고프지?

translation.en: -[Bosco] Thank you, Mummy. -No. Let Bos eat.
I've got some news.
Who's gone and got you fucking pregnant, bro?
-What? No one. What's wrong with you? -[Bosco] Oh. Good.
No, it's about my career.
-I told you, your time's coming, man. -No. No, Bos.
translation.ko: - 네 때가 올 거라니까 - 그게 아니라

translation.en: I'm gonna be doing suttin' else. Suttin' kinda new.
translation.ko: 다른 걸 하려고 해 새로운 거

translation.en: "New"? What do you mean "new"?
I'm gonna be singing. I mean, we both know I can write, so…
translation.ko: 노래를 할 거야 내가 곡은 좀 쓰잖아

translation.en: Singing where?
Where you gonna find the time to do that when you're working for me and here?
translation.ko: 나랑 엄마 밑에서 일하면서 그럴 시간이 어디서 나서?

translation.en: Stop being silly, man.
Well, you're not gonna like it, but at first, I'm gonna be singing on Bulla's new track.
translation.ko: 맘에 안 들겠지만 불라의 신곡에 나도 참여해

translation.en: Heard my voice. He thinks I might have suttin'.
-You're joking, innit? -Nah.
I spoke to Mark earlier. He's gonna trial manage me for--
translation.ko: 마크랑 얘기했는데 일단 임시로 날 관리하고…

translation.en: -Mum! Are you hearing this? -[Aria] Leave me out of it.
translation.ko: - 엄마! 얘 말 들었어요? - 난 빼줘라

translation.en: Vita! That's my rival you know?
This is about me doing suttin' I think I can do.
translation.ko: 내가 잘하는 일을 하고 싶은 것뿐이야

translation.en: How you mean? You've been there with me since day one. You know how much that guy mads me.
translation.ko: 넌 처음부터 다 지켜봤잖아 그놈이 내 꼭지 돌게 하는 거

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I've been in it with you from day one, and I'm still in it now.
translation.ko: 난 처음부터 곁에 있었고 지금도 곁에 있어

translation.en: -Look at what I'm doing. -You tryin' to fuck up my comeback, innit?
translation.ko: - 이 곡도 주려고 하고! - 내 컴백 망칠 셈이구나?

translation.en: Who can I trust to write with me if you go, huh? I'm fucked.
translation.ko: 네가 가면 누굴 믿고 같이 곡을 써? 난 망했다고!

translation.en: Write with you, or write for you?
translation.ko: 같이 쓰다니? 부려 먹는 건 아니고?

translation.en: Vita, please. Your brother's upset.
When isn't he upset, Mum?
translation.ko: 화 안 났을 때가 있긴 해요?

translation.en: When aren't I doing everything to make sure he's okay?
translation.ko: 내가 오빠를 안 챙긴 적이 있어요?

translation.en: If you'd let me be your manager, I wouldn't have to do my own thing.
translation.ko: 날 매니저 시켰으면 내 길을 안 찾아봐도 됐잖아

translation.en: -Within your lane, man. -Nah, nah, nah. I've listened to you long enough, Bosco.
translation.ko: - 주제넘지 마 - 그동안 오빠 말대로 살았어

translation.en: And I ain't staying in any lane. I'm gonna swerve right into yours.
translation.ko: 그리고 주제넘을 거야 오빠 위로 올라설 거라고

translation.en: Look at the jealousy. I always knew this was gonna happen. I knew it.
translation.ko: 질투하는군 이런 일이 일어날 줄 알았어!

translation.en: Jealous, Bosco?
I've been living, breathing, writing,
translation.ko: 난 그동안 숨 쉬고 곡을 쓰고

translation.en: and lying for you ever since I can remember.
Everything I do is to make sure you're good.
But in your head, I was always gonna be in your shadow, innit?
translation.ko: 오빠 머릿속에선 난 오빠 그늘에만 머물겠지

translation.en: Well, it's Champion versus Champion now.
So get ready.
♪ Champion to the world ♪
♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
translation.ko: 승자독식, 그래서 내가 네 여자의 챔피언이라지

translation.en: ♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.ko: 내 허리를 지탱하는 구찌 챔피언에겐 벨트가 있지

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.ko: 승자는 승자를 알아봐 네가 챔피언이라면 난 알아

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
♪ Champion to the world ♪
♪ Winners only, that's why they say That I'm champion to your girl ♪
translation.ko: 승자독식, 그래서 내가 네 여자의 챔피언이라지

translation.en: ♪ Gucci holding my waist up Every champion needs a belt ♪
translation.ko: 내 허리를 지탱하는 구찌 챔피언에겐 벨트가 있지

translation.en: ♪ Winners recognize winners If you're a champion, I can tell ♪
translation.ko: 승자는 승자를 알아봐 네가 챔피언이라면 난 알아

translation.en: ♪ I can tell ♪
